name: EXO ball
description:
ex·o·sphere n - The outermost region of a planet's atmosphere. Run, jump and fly as you try to make your ball to he hole in as few shots as possible. Its mini-golf meets archery in space, but the ball is bigger than you are and not everything is as it seems. One-way walls, flipping gravity, portals and more await you and your friends in this sports puzzle game (demo is single player).

Developed in Unity for the Oculus Rift and Touch, Multiplayer and Vive support is planned.

Feedback is greatly needed, thanks for trying!
